@graph.caption: Close up of Tikki Chaat on a white plate

@graph.name: Sunday brunch Tikki chaat (Potato Cutlets with chutney) - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Sunday brunch of the Tikki Chaat(Potato Cutlet with sweet and sour topping!) Vegan, Gluten Free, Nut Free. Easy to follow instructions.

itemListElement.name: Sunday brunch Tikki chaat (Potato Cutlets with chutney)

@graph.name: Tikki Chaat (Potatoe Cutlets with Chutney)
@graph.description: Sunday brunch of the Tikki Chaat(Potato Cutlet with sweet and sour topping!) Vegan, Gluten Free, Nut Free.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon red chili powder or black pepper
1 cup tamarind pulp (boil tamarind in little water and remove seeds)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients together and form small 3-4 inch flat burgers patties
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the ingredients together and form small 3-4 inch flat burgers patties

recipeInstructions.text: Shallow fry the patties and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Shallow fry the patties and keep aside.

itemListElement.text: In a medium pan, add all ingredients and bring to a boil on medium heat stirring occasionally. Add a little water if the chutney consistency is too thick.
itemListElement.name: In a medium pan, add all ingredients and bring to a boil on medium heat stirring occasionally. Add a little water if the chutney consistency is too thick.

itemListElement.text: Reduce heat to low and let the chutney cook till it gets an even creamy thickness ( usually 15-20 minutes. or it depends on the content of water in the pulp)
itemListElement.name: Reduce heat to low and let the chutney cook till it gets an even creamy thickness ( usually 15-20 minutes. or it depends on the content of water in the pulp)

itemListElement.text: Let is cool. Chutney can be stored in airtight container refrigerated for a couple of months.
itemListElement.name: Let is cool. Chutney can be stored in airtight container refrigerated for a couple of months.

itemListElement.text: In a pressure cooker, add oil, cumin seeds and asafetida.
itemListElement.name: In a pressure cooker, add oil, cumin seeds and asafetida.

itemListElement.text: Cook on medium heat till cumin seeds start to give out an aroma
itemListElement.name: Cook on medium heat till cumin seeds start to give out an aroma

itemListElement.text: Add serrano pepper and mix well. Let it cook for a minute.
itemListElement.name: Add serrano pepper and mix well. Let it cook for a minute.

itemListElement.text: Add ginger garlic paste, tomatoes and salt and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Add ginger garlic paste, tomatoes and salt and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Add in the soaked black chickpeas and water and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Add in the soaked black chickpeas and water and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Pressure cook on medium heat for 3 whistles.
itemListElement.name: Pressure cook on medium heat for 3 whistles.

itemListElement.text: Take off the heat and keep aside.
itemListElement.name: Take off the heat and keep aside.

itemListElement.text: To serve, arrange the Cutlets on a plate. Drop spoonfuls of Black chickpea curry on the cutlets. Top it off with a teaspoon of Tamarind chutney on each cutlet.
itemListElement.name: To serve, arrange the Cutlets on a plate. Drop spoonfuls of Black chickpea curry on the cutlets. Top it off with a teaspoon of Tamarind chutney on each cutlet.

itemListElement.text: You can also add more toppings like finely chopped onions. cilantro leaves, green chutney and/or thin sev( lentil party mix )
itemListElement.name: You can also add more toppings like finely chopped onions. cilantro leaves, green chutney and/or thin sev( lentil party mix )

itemListElement.text: Enjoy the sweet and sour mouth watering dish as snack or brunch!!
itemListElement.name: Enjoy the sweet and sour mouth watering dish as snack or brunch!!

@graph.keywords: brunch recipe, potato cutlets, sweet and sour
